foreignData.name: Mauerbelebung
foreignData.text: Die verzauberte Mauer kann nun auch angreifen.

mainBoard.name: Animate Wall
mainBoard.originalText: Target wall can now attack. Target wall's power and toughness are unchanged by this enchantment, even if its power is 0.

rulings.text: This is a change from the most recent wording. As was the case in the past, Animate Wall can now enchant only a Wall.

mainBoard.text:
Enchant Wall
Enchanted Wall can attack as though it didn't have defender.

mainBoard.flavorText: Benalia has a complex caste system that changes with the lunar year. No matter what the season, the only caste that cannot be attained by either heredity or money is that of the hero.
mainBoard.name: Benalish Hero

rulings.text: A maximum of one nonbanding creature can join an attacking band no matter how many creatures with banding are in it.
Creatures in the same band must all attack the same player or planeswalker.

If a creature with banding attacks, it can team up with any number of other attacking creatures with banding (and up to one nonbanding creature) and attack as a unit called a "band." The band can be blocked by any creature that could block a single creature in the band. Blocking any creature in a band blocks the entire band. If a creature with banding is blocked, the attacking player chooses how the blockers' damage is assigned.
If a creature in combat has banding, its controller assigns damage for creatures blocking or blocked by it.

mainBoard.text: Banding (Any creatures with banding, and up to one without, can attack in a band. Bands are blocked as a group. If any creatures with banding you control are blocking or being blocked by a creature, you divide that creature's combat damage, not its controller, among any of the creatures it's being blocked by or is blocking.)

foreignData.name: Segen
foreignData.text: {W}: Die verzauberte Kreatur erhält +1/+1 bis zum Ende des Zuges.

mainBoard.name: Blessing
mainBoard.text:
Enchant creature
{W}: Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

foreignData.name: Burg
foreignData.text: Alle nicht getappten Kreaturen, die nicht angreifen, erhalten +0/+2.

mainBoard.name: Castle
mainBoard.originalText: Your untapped creatures gain +0/+2. Attacking creatures do not get this bonus.

foreignData.name: Entzauberung
foreignData.text: Zerstöre eine Verzauberung oder ein Artefakt.

mainBoard.name: Disenchant
mainBoard.originalText: Target enchantment or artifact is destroyed.

rulings.text: This is not modal. If the target changes from an artifact to an enchantment or vice versa, this still destroys it.

mainBoard.flavorText: Sometimes it's best to let sleeping dragons lie.
mainBoard.name: Elder Land Wurm
mainBoard.originalText:
Trample
Wurm cannot attack until it has been assigned as a blocker.

rulings.text: Another effect can give Elder Land Wurm defender after it has lost it. Blocking again will cause it to lose that instance of defender too.

mainBoard.text:
Defender, trample
When this creature blocks, it loses defender.

mainBoard.name: Fortified Area
mainBoard.originalText: All your walls gain +1/+0 and banding.
mainBoard.text: Wall creatures you control get +1/+0 and have banding. (Any creatures with banding, and up to one without, can attack in a band. Bands are blocked as a group. If any creatures with banding you control are blocking or being blocked by a creature, you divide that creature's combat damage, not its controller, among any of the creatures it's being blocked by or is blocking.)

foreignData.name: Heilbalsam
foreignData.text: Gib Dir oder einem Spieler Deiner Wahl 3 Lebenspunkte, oder verhindere bis zu 3 Schadenspunkte bei einer Kreatur oder einem Spieler.

mainBoard.name: Healing Salve
mainBoard.originalText: Gain 3 life, or prevent up to 3 damage from being dealt to a single target.
mainBoard.text:
Choose one —
• Target player gains 3 life.
• Prevent the next 3 damage that would be dealt to any target this turn.

foreignData.name: Elfenbeinkelch
foreignData.text: {1}: Jeder erfolgreich gesprochene weiße Zauberspruch gibt Dir 1 Lebenspunkt. Du kannst diese Eigenschaft sofort oder später während des Zuges anwenden, aber nur einmal pro weißem Zauberspruch.

mainBoard.name: Ivory Cup
mainBoard.originalText: {1}: Any white spell cast gives you 1 life. Can only give 1 life each time a white spell is cast.
mainBoard.text: Whenever a player casts a white spell, you may pay {1}. If you do, you gain 1 life.

mainBoard.flavorText: Before a woman marries in the village of Sursi, she must visit the land of the Mesa Pegasus. Legend has it that if the woman is pure of heart and her love is true, a Mesa Pegasus will appear, blessing her family with long life and good fortune.
mainBoard.name: Mesa Pegasus

mainBoard.flavorText: "As the cavalry bore down, we faced them with swords drawn and pikes hidden in the grass at our feet. 'Don't lift your pikes 'til I give the word,' I said." —Maeveen O'Donagh, *Memoirs of a Soldier*
mainBoard.name: Pikemen

mainBoard.name: Plains
mainBoard.originalText: ocT: Add {W} to your mana pool.

mainBoard.name: Plains
mainBoard.originalText: ocT: Add {W} to your mana pool.

mainBoard.name: Plains
mainBoard.originalText: ocT: Add {W} to your mana pool.

foreignData.name: Umkehrschaden
foreignData.text: Aller Schaden, den Du bislang in diesem Zug von einer bestimmten Quelle erhalten hast, wird zu Deinem Lebenspunkten hinzuaddiert statt abgezogen. Wenn Du in diesem Zug noch weiteren Schaden aus dieser Quelle erhältst, wird dieser ganz normal behandelt.

mainBoard.name: Reverse Damage
mainBoard.originalText: All damage you have taken from any one source this turn is added to your life total instead of subtracted from it.

rulings.text: It only affects damage dealt by the source one time. If the source damages you a second time this turn, the damage will not be reversed.

mainBoard.text: The next time a source of your choice would deal damage to you this turn, prevent that damage. You gain life equal to the damage prevented this way.

mainBoard.name: Spirit Link
mainBoard.originalText: For every point of damage target creature does, you gain 1 life.

rulings.text: The triggered ability triggers when the enchanted creature deals any damage, not only combat damage.

Unlike the lifelink ability, the ability of Spirit Link is a triggered ability that goes on the stack and may be responded to. Notably, if the enchanted creature deals damage at the same time you’re dealt enough damage to reduce your life total to 0 or less, you’ll lose the game before you can gain any life.

mainBoard.text:
Enchant creature (Target a creature as you cast this. This card enters attached to that creature.)
Whenever enchanted creature deals damage, you gain that much life.

foreignData.name: Schwerter zu Pflugscharen
foreignData.text: Nimm eine Kreatur ganz aus dem Spiel. Ihr Beherrscher erhält dafür so viele Lebenspunkte wie die Kreatur Stärke hatte.

mainBoard.name: Swords to Plowshares
mainBoard.originalText: Target creature is removed from game entirely. Creature's controller gains life points equal to creature's power.

rulings.text: Use the power of the creature from when it was last on the battlefield to determine how much life is gained.

mainBoard.text: Exile target creature. Its controller gains life equal to its power.

mainBoard.flavorText: Even the most conservative generals revised their tactics after the Battle of Sarinth, during which a handful of peasant-pikemen held off a trio of rampaging Craw Wurms.
mainBoard.name: Wall of Spears
mainBoard.originalText: First strike, counts as a wall.
mainBoard.text:
Defender (This creature can't attack.)
First strike

mainBoard.flavorText: Just as the evil ones approached to slay Justina, she cast a great spell, imbuing her weapons with her own life force. Thus she fulfilled the prophecy: "In the death of your savior will you find salvation."
mainBoard.name: Wall of Swords

foreignData.name: Schutzkreis gegen Schwarz
foreignData.text: {1}: Schützt Dich gegen allen Schaden aus einer schwarzen Quelle. Wenn Dir eine Schadensquelle mehr als einmal in einem Zug Schaden zufügt, kannst Du jedesmal 1 zahlen, um den Schaden zu vermeiden.

sideBoard.name: Circle of Protection: Black
sideBoard.originalText: {1}: Prevents all damage against you from one black source. If a source does damage to you more than once in a turn, you must pay 1 mana each time you want to prevent the damage.

rulings.text: A source of damage is a permanent, a spell on the stack (including one that creates a permanent), or any object referred to by an object on the stack. A source doesn’t need to be capable of dealing damage to be a legal choice.
Can be used even when there is no damage to prevent. It prevents the next damage (if any) from the source this turn.

sideBoard.text: {1}: The next time a black source of your choice would deal damage to you this turn, prevent that damage.
